name: Brolections 2022
description:
(Please read out loud, this is a french game ;) )

Een present-dai france, la mothair of all elecshe-ons eez approachéng, le presidential brulecshé-on. Ze oppairtunitay fair all la most viulent bros een la republic to (con)conquair potential votairs by fairce.

Plai as ze president of la republic, bromannuel macron, as well as all 'is most powairful challengairs such as jéan luc mélenbro, brairik zemmur, yannik jabrot, brulairie pécréze and many othairs to discovair een game. Go (con)quair votairs wiv la strength of yur brogram, yur charisma but above all yur feests. La favairite electairates of zé francais weehl all be zere, le ci-git lé jaune, le rapitaleests, ze tairroirreests: natuair peach et tradibro, la great replacemonts, final-lee fullowed by ze inbroductive and othair civil cervonts! Een le end, on-lee un weehl remain.

Et lé republic, eet weehl be 'im!

Electairal viulence:

Draw le blood of le opposeng electairaté wiv la strength of yur feests. Un lez opposeng vote eez un maire vote fair you, eet eez mazematical.

Turism:

Explaire francé from coast to coast een 5 levels, from la défense to la fairêt de fontainébréau. 70 km as le crow flees, we're not kiddeng you!

Francais identitay:

Find le favairite electairates of ze francais, le ci-git la jaune, le grand substitutes, la rapitaleests et many othairs. But not la teachairs, nobody likes la teachairs...

Republic champions:
Taypical-lee francais hairoes who weehl give you a 'ard time. See zees.



Jean Lassalle:



Shairt circuit:

Zis game eez 100% francais subcontracted een la third whirld (Pakeestan, Bangladésh, India, Brazil, et of cous England...)
